title: Mirror Ball Flashing Magic
original_name: ミラーボール・フラッシング・マジック
sinopse:
A collection of Yamashita Tomoko's oneshots published in Feel Young and flowers.

1.  Utsukushii Mori
2.  Mirror Ball Flashing Magic
3.  don't TRUST over TEEN

5.  Itsuka Anata no Fushigi no Oppai
6.  Karen
7.  Ebony Olive
